name: BLNCG19 #1
description: Part 1 of an homage to the genius of Demna Gvasalia, a 3d rendering fully textured, modelled and composed by the artist, taking inspiration from the eponymous 2019 runway dubbed 'Into the Void' by critics, I recreated a small scene from the labyrinthine runway with an Eliza Douglas inspired model wearing custom MetaScorpius x Balenciaga garments. made using Blender, Photoshop and DazStudio. Credits to artists who allowed free use of their base models for interpretation.
